title: Avant Garde Roundend?
content:
Hi,

does anybody know a Avant Garde in Rounded? Or a similar font?

Thanks,  
Jan
author: ntry

comments.content: [Bryant](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315072518/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/bryant/) might be close to what you're looking for.

VAG Rounded may also suit you:

[http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/searchresults.htm?st=5&cid=Volkswagen+AG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315072518/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/searchresults.htm?st=5&cid=Volkswagen+AG "http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/searchresults.htm?st=5&cid=Volkswagen+AG")

ChrisL
[Resine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315072518/http:/www.drewflaherty.com/home.html) from Drew Flaherty has the feel of Avant Garde Rounded.
What about [Hess Gothic Round NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315072518/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/hess-gothic-round-nf/) by Nick Curtis?
